      <script>
       $(document).ready(function(){
		$('#menu-icon').on( "click", function() {
			$('.ps_megamenu').slideToggle();
		});
		$(window).scroll(function(){
		    
		    
		    
		    
		    
			var a = jQuery("#sticky-header").offset().top;
			if($(window).scrollTop() > a)
			{
				$('.snap_menu').show();	
				$(".row-top").addClass('row-top-fixed');
				$(".row-top").css("padding-bottom","0px");
				$("#menu-icon").show();
				$(".ps_megamenu").hide();
		}
		else
		{	
			$('.snap_menu').hide();	
			$(".row-top").removeClass('row-top-fixed');
			$("#menu-icon").hide();
			$(".ps_megamenu").show();
		}

	});	
});
      </script>
      <script>
       $(document).ready(function(){       
    //gototop
		$(window).scroll(function() {
		    
		    
		     if ($(window).scrollTop() >= 300) {
	    
		        $('.mini_button').hide();
		    } else {
		        
			$('.mini_button').show();
		    } 
		    
		    
		    
        if ($(window).scrollTop() >= 200) {
		        $('#to_top').fadeIn();
		    } else {
		        $('#to_top').fadeOut();
		    }
		});
		$("#to_top").click(function(){
			$("body,html").animate({scrollTop:0	},"normal");
			$("body,html").animate({scrollTop:0	},"normal");
				return!1
		});         
});
      </script>

          <script type="text/javascript">
           // Offcanvas
     $('[data-toggle="offcanvas"]').click(function () {
	 
	 
	// alert('1');
	var overflowc = $( 'html' ).css( "overflow" );
	if(overflowc == 'hidden'){
	    $('html').css('overflow','');
	    $('html').css('position','');
	    
	
	}
	else{
	    $('html').css('overflow','hidden');
	    $('html').css('position','fixed');
	    
	     
	     
	}
	 
	 
	 
        $('.row-offcanvas').toggleClass('active')
    });
    $( "body" ).on( "click", "i.click-canavs-menu", function() {

        $(this).parent().find('.dropdown-menu:first').toggle();
    });
          </script>

               <div class="headingtextq" style="display:inline-block;color:#fff">
                When it comes to finding just the right look for your hair online, Elevate Styles offers a wide assortment of lace wigs and other products for sale. Buy synthetic Swiss lace with long, wavy strands or...
               </div>
               <span class="fa fa-plus" style="color:#fff;float:right">
               </span>
               <div class="divf" style="display:none;color:#fff">
                When it comes to finding just the right look for your hair online, Elevate Styles offers a wide assortment of lace wigs and other products for sale. Buy synthetic Swiss lace with long, wavy strands or opt for human hair lace wigs in short and straight cuts — whatever wig suits your personal tastes, our company has it for sale. Products with adjustable straps and soft textures ensure you stay comfortable as well as stylish wherever you go. Turn heads with hairstyles that complement your natural beauty and personality. Wigs featuring the 360 Style View allow you to assess the product from multiple angles and get a better sense of the hairstyle. For even more variety, find crochet braids for sale in our vast online selection. Some offer long braids with plenty of volume for a bold, sturdy look, while other crochet braids lend to a sleek, yet exotic style for your hair. Get creative and explore all the hair color options online before you buy. Consider stunning blues, fiery reds, or royally purple braids for fresh bursts of color, or choose more natural blacks and browns for subtle looks. On the other hand, colors like a subdued burgundy can offer the best of both worlds. There’s no shortage of possibilities with all of these styles and colors at your fingertips. Elevate Styles is a Google-certified company and Trusted Store. Browse through our reviews to find thousands of positive testimonies from shoppers just like you, looking to buy the right hair. Our online wig company also offers free domestic shipping to customers who buy up to $60 worth of wig related products. This offer doesn't include discounts, vouchers, and sales tax, and your shopping cart will keep track of shipping deductions as you shop. We also ship internationally and to military installations where applicable. Follow Elevate Styles on social media — Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Pinterest, Google Plus, Twitter, wherever! From these pages, you can keep up with the hottest trends our company has for sale and find inspiration for your own unique and emerging style. Who knows — you might stumble upon an alluring new look for your next night out.
               </div>
              </li>

           <script type="text/javascript">
            $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".info .show_hide").click(function () {        
        if($('.info .flinks').is(':visible'))
            $(".info .show_hide .plusminus").removeClass("fa-minus").addClass("fa-plus");
        else
            $(" .info .show_hide .plusminus").removeClass("fa-plus").addClass("fa-minus");
        $('.info .flinks').toggle();
 });
    $(".account .show_hide").click(function () {        
        if($('.account .flinks').is(':visible'))
            $(".account .show_hide .plusminus").removeClass( "fa-minus" ).addClass( "fa-plus" );
        else
            $(".account .show_hide .plusminus").removeClass( "fa-plus" ).addClass( "fa-minus" );
        $('.account .flinks').toggle();    
    });

    $(".block-contactinfo .show_hide").click(function () {        
        if($('.block-contactinfo .faddress').is(':visible'))
          $(".block-contactinfo .show_hide .plusminus").removeClass( "fa-minus" ).addClass( "fa-plus" );
        else
          $(".block-contactinfo .show_hide .plusminus").removeClass( "fa-plus" ).addClass( "fa-minus" );
        $('.block-contactinfo .faddress').toggle();    
    });

    $(".moreinfo .show_hide").click(function () {        
        if($('.moreinfo .fpay').is(':visible'))
            $(".moreinfo .show_hide .plusminus").removeClass( "fa-minus" ).addClass( "fa-plus" );
        else
            $(".moreinfo .show_hide .plusminus").removeClass( "fa-plus" ).addClass( "fa-minus" );
        $('.moreinfo .fpay').toggle();    
    });

    $(".moreinfo .socialshow_hide").click(function () {        
        if($('.moreinfo .social-ul').is(':visible'))
            $(".moreinfo .socialshow_hide .socialplusminus").removeClass( "fa-minus" ).addClass( "fa-plus" );
        else
            $(".moreinfo .socialshow_hide .socialplusminus").removeClass( "fa-plus" ).addClass( "fa-minus" );
        $('.moreinfo .social-ul').toggle();    
    });
});
           </script>
